name: European Union Chamber of Commerce in China
membership: Member of the European Business Organisation (EBO) Worldwide Network
goal:
Purpose
As the independent voice of European business in China, we seek greater market access and improved operating conditions for European companies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Trade, Investment, EU-China Comprehensive Agreement on Investment, Trade Defense Instruments, Overcapacity
